resources.string:
Instructions:

- Mobile with installed QR scanner. 
No other electronic device are permitted.
 - This is a team participation event.(max 4 person is allowed in single team)
 - Solo participation is allowed.(they will be formed in team by event coordinator)
 -Use of internet is prohibited.
Time will be notice by application once you hit Start.
Once you solve it, Answer will show you the next location.\n follow Map\npress next and scan clue from next location
